attributes.action: Make all animals/pets to be microchipped and registered with a chip company.
attributes.additional_details: I run the found cats only UK page and there are more rehomed due to owners not being found than, there are reunited on a daily basis, all over Facebook people are advertising found pets, microchipped but not registered, it's so frustrating when by a click of the mouse the owners can be found.
attributes.background: Too many pets/animals are being lost, stolen and found, in a lot of cases these pets/animals are never reunited with their owners, some success stories where pets are chipped and registered are reunited instantly this would save so much heartache if it was a legal requirement.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you're concerned about identifying lost pets, but we're not sure if you mean all animals, or just cats and dogs.

If you would like it to be mandatory to have cats microchipped, as well as dogs, you may like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/242069
